references.paper_title: The pascal visual object classes (voc) challenge
references.reason: It is a foundational paper in object recognition, providing the PASCAL VOC dataset widely used for benchmarking few-shot segmentation models.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduced the ResNet architecture, a crucial backbone network used extensively in few-shot segmentation for feature extraction.
This work is among the earliest to introduce few-shot segmentation, a crucial topic upon which this paper builds and extends.
The attention mechanism, introduced in this paper, is a cornerstone of many modern few-shot segmentation methods including those this paper contrasts with.

references.paper_title: Matching networks for one shot learning
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work on one-shot learning, foundational to the few-shot learning paradigm this paper addresses.
